screens.image_description: An automotive factory line with robotic arms and car panels moving on the conveyor. Priya, a focused female engineer, is observing the assembly line while holding a tablet. The lighting is bright, and the mood is busy and industrial. She is surrounded by large monitors displaying vehicle finish inspections.
screens.caption: Priya, an automotive engineer, is determined to address the increasing customer complaints about vehicle finish quality at Autoline Manufacturing.

screens.image_description: Priya is in a meeting room with Carlos, a senior vehicle inspector. They're both looking at a screen showing an AI interface with highlighted sections on a digital image of a car panel. The room has a serious atmosphere, with the focus on collaboration between technology and expertise.
screens.caption: Priya collaborates with Carlos, leveraging his inspection experience to select the best AI system for detecting surface defects on car panels.

screens.image_description: A close-up of Priya's hands as she configures the AI system on her tablet. The AI interface is visible, showing real-time feedback with annotations on car panel images. The environment is tense, symbolizing the critical decision-making in integrating AI with human judgment.
screens.caption: Priya faces the crucial task of calibrating the AI system to ensure its feedback is accurate and complements the human inspectors' nuanced decisions.

screens.image_description: The assembly line again, but now with the AI system in action. A technician is inspecting a car panel with a defect highlighted by the AI on a monitor overhead. Priya and Carlos are in the background, watching carefully, analyzing the situation.
screens.caption: The AI system's real-time feedback highlights a defect on a car panel, and the technician's response to it will demonstrate if Priya's integration is a success.

screens.image_description: A celebration moment in the factory, with Priya and Carlos giving a thumbs-up to the team. The background shows a digital scoreboard with improved quality metrics. The factory is well-lit, and the mood is one of achievement and optimism.
screens.caption: Thanks to the responsible interpretation of the AI system outputs by the human inspectors, Autoline Manufacturing sees a significant improvement in vehicle finish quality.
